categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: A species of tall weed was found on the planet of Lok. During the Galactic Civil War, a Human named Ran Machado was under orders from Nym, the leader of the Lok Revenants, to remove the cacti from Nym's Stronghold.
This tall weed appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
